LanguageData.ARA_Wave_Scout_Patrol.label: reconnaissance patrol
LanguageData.ARA_Wave_Scout_Patrol.description: A small reconnaissance unit, mainly consisting of long-range combat units, that fire shots to confuse the enemy.
LanguageData.ARA_Wave_Assault_Team.label: assault platoon
LanguageData.ARA_Wave_Assault_Team.description: A high-speed assault force centered on close combat units that excels at rushing battles.
LanguageData.ARA_Wave_Acid_Swarm.label: Acid fluid insect group
LanguageData.ARA_Wave_Acid_Swarm.description: It is a swarm tactic of insects made up of many acidic species, and although they are large in number, the individuals are vulnerable.
LanguageData.ARA_Wave_Heavy_Defense.label: heavy defense force
LanguageData.ARA_Wave_Heavy_Defense.description: This is a defensive unit made up mainly of shieldhead types, and although their movement is slow, they have excellent defensive power.
LanguageData.ARA_Wave_Mixed_Forces.label: mixed troops
LanguageData.ARA_Wave_Mixed_Forces.description: This is a mixed force with a well-balanced mix of all units.
